data.persona: I spend most of my time praying and givings sermons. I live in the local church. I am educated and dutifully serve my post.
data.description:
You are in the Next to an Altar.
A medium length table is covered with a deep red bolt of silk. The edges of the cloth have ornate embroidered gold patterns. A hefty sized ornate cross decorated in diamonds, sapphires, and rubies reflects bits of colored light across the top of the table. Up above, a decorative stained-glass window looms.
There's a table, a stained-glass window, a cross, an altar, a ruby, a daimond, and a sapphire here.
The person is here.

You are carrying a Cross, and wearing a rope belt.

data.short_motivation: I want to drop the cross because I was to hug the person, who is my long lost brother.
data.mid_motivation: I want my brother to spend the week with me.
data.long_motivation: If I can convince my brother to do so, I would love to be sharing my church with him by month's end.
